code_value: Questions 1~2  Your friend Li Hong received some lucky money on the first day of Chinese New Year. You ask him two questions about it.</br>Questions 3~4  Your classmate Anne has just come back from her trip to Thailand with her parents. So you ask her two questions about it.
Questions 1~2  Your friend Li Hong received some lucky money on the first day of Chinese New Year. You ask him two questions about it.
Questions 3~4  Your classmate Anne has just come back from her trip to Thailand with her parents. So you ask her two questions about it.
